name: regimen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any set of rules about food and exercise that someone follows, especially in order to improve their health: After his heart attack the doctor put him on a strict regimen. Synonym

a set of rules about food, exercise, or behavior that you follow, esp. in order to improve your health: His doctor put him on a strict regimen of exercise and low-fat food.
